column1: - All new hires goes through this training from Day 1 - 2

column5: Trainer: Brief new hires on the self-study structure and set clear expectations for the training.

Player: Self-study everything you need to know about StoreHub—from product offerings and features to how we empower merchants to deliver the best business experience.

Module covers:
- Module 1: Software

Players will need to update learning progress to trainer by 6:00pm

Player: Self-study everything you need to know about StoreHub—from product offerings and features to how we empower merchants to deliver the best business experience.

Module covers:
- Module 2 : Hardware

Players will need to update learning progress to trainer by 6:00pm

Player: Self-study everything you need to know about StoreHub—from product offerings and features to how we empower merchants to deliver the best business experience.

Module covers:
- Module 3 : Features

Players will need to update learning progress to trainer by 6:00pm
Player: To complete studying training slides if can't finish during working hours

Player: Continue to self study on the remaining Modules

Topic covers:
- Module 4: System Navigation 
- Module 5: Merchant Profile

By the end of this session, all players must complete the slides

column4: All-in-One StoreHub - System Navigation & Merchant Profile
column5:
Player: Continue to self study on the remaining Modules

Topic covers:
- Module 4: System Navigation 
- Module 5: Merchant Profile

By the end of this session, all players must complete the slides
Trainer: Conduct a face to face demo session on the Hardware devices.
Trainer: Conduct a quick sync up to address players concern on topics that they have learned.
Player: Complete a set of 48 questions with a passing score of 80%. Use the slides as a reference, as it is an open-book test. No retakes given if failed.
Trainer: Attend to players if they have any concerns and advise next steps after lunch
